title: PMEGP Loan Scheme
description: Loans for new manufacturing units up to 50 Lakhs. Best for small factories.

title: PM Vishwakarma
description: Low interest loans for carpenters, tailors, blacksmiths, and 18 other trades.

title: MUDRA Loan
description: Collateral-free loans for expanding existing small businesses.

title: Stand-Up India
description: Big ticket loans for Green field projects by SC/ST or Women entrepreneurs.

title: PLI Textile Scheme
description: Production Linked Incentive for Man Made Fabrics and Technical Textiles.

title: TUF Scheme (ATUFS)
description: One-time subsidy on purchasing new machinery for textile units.

title: PM Kisan Sampada
description: For setting up Cold Chains, Food Processing units, and Agro clusters.

title: Credit Guarantee (CGTMSE)
description: Govt gives guarantee to bank for your loan if you have no collateral.

title: FAME II EV Subsidy
description: Subsidy on buying Commercial Electric Vehicles (3-Wheelers/4-Wheelers).

title: Startup India Seed Fund
description: Free money (Grant) for building prototypes and MVP for tech startups.

title: National Livestock Mission
description: Subsidy for Goat farming, Poultry, and Piggery infrastructure.

title: Rooftop Solar Subsidy
description: Get money back for installing solar panels on your home or factory roof.

title: Mahila Samman Savings
description: Special high-interest savings certificate scheme for women.

title: Ambedkar Social Innovation
description: Venture Capital funding for SC/ST students and entrepreneurs.

title: PM Awas Yojana
description: Subsidy on Home Loan interest for first-time home buyers.
